name: The lump
summary: George is a complete social outcast. One day he notices a lump on his head, which the doctor pronounces benign; the next day, it becomes a second head, much better looking; he hides his real head, and suddenly becomes much more popular. George becomes a politician, on a "save the snails" platform; he gets recruited as an empty suit for some evil advisors and is swept into office.
info:
• 中文名: 瘤
  • 上映年度: 1991
  • 片长: 7:26
  • 制片国家/地区: 加拿大
  • 语言: 英语
  • 导演: John Weldon
